title: Define Project Requirements for FunctionalReactiveProgrammingForIoT
description: Gather and document functional requirements (e.g., real-time data processing, event-driven programming) as well as non-functional requirements (scalability, security, reliability, performance, usability, maintainability, interoperability) for the IoT framework in the FunctionalReactiveProgrammingForIoT project. This includes outlining specific use cases and edge-cases, defining interfaces and APIs, and considering the long-term development and maintenance plans.

title: Design Framework Architecture
description: Create a high-level architecture design for the IoT framework using functional reactive programming.

title: Develop Core Functionalities
description: Implement the core functionalities of the framework such as handling streams of sensor data and device control.

title: Create User Interface Design
description: Design the user interface for interacting with the IoT framework.

title: Implement User Interface
description: Build the user interface based on the designed UI.

title: Test Framework Functionality
description: Perform functional and non-functional testing on the IoT framework. This includes testing for edge cases, performance, security aspects, and system integration tests where applicable. Please note that this task requires a focus on various aspects such as robustness, scalability, and reliability.

title: Integrate Security Measures
description: Implement security measures to protect the IoT framework and data.

title: Perform Code Audit and Optimization
description: Review and optimize the code for performance and maintainability.

title: Prepare Detailed and Comprehensive Documentation
description: Write detailed, concise, and easy-to-understand documentation for the IoT framework, covering architecture, usage, setup, integration with other systems, security measures, error handling, performance optimizations, best practices, and code examples. Include a comprehensive glossary of terms specific to the framework. Ensure the documentation is regularly updated to reflect any changes or updates in the framework. Additionally, break down the documentation into manageable sections for easier navigation and understanding. Provide clear examples that demonstrate how to use the various features of the framework effectively.

title: Deploy IoT Framework to Production
description: Deploy the IoT framework to production environment and ensure smooth operation.
